column2: This character was born under circumstances that are signs of a great destiny, according to Népmese traditions.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] favours me! The events surrounding my birth all seem to mean one thing: I have a great future and great destiny to follow.

My [From.GetSonDaughter], [From.GetName] has born under auspicious circustances... our Táltos believes that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has been blessed by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], meaning [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is destined for much glory and greatness!
